location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Stephen Babington, Deputy Secretary to the Government, Bombay, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident, Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter encloses a copy of a letter, dated 21 June 1811, from William Kennedy, Register of the Recorder's Court, Bombay, to Jonathan Duncan, Governor and President in Council, Bombay, regarding the estate and debts of the late Aga Mahomed Bhubaumey (also spelled Babony and Bebanee). The enclosed letter includes its own enclosure: a memorial, dated 21 June 1811, from the deceased's widow to Duncan.
